title: Protection of socket-outlets identified 'CLEANING PURPOSES ONLY'
fullText:
Socket-outlets that are identified 'CLEANING PURPOSES ONLY' shall be protected by LPDs.
These LPDs shall not be used to protect any socket-outlets that are not identified 'CLEANING PURPOSES ONLY'.
The requirements of Clause 2.6 for access to controls and indicators of protective devices do not apply to these LPDs.
These LPDs may be used to protect socket-outlets identified 'CLEANING PURPOSES ONLY' in any other areas.
If an RCD is used as an LPD it shall be a Type 1 RCD.
